title: Developing social skills through structured learning
description: Developing social skills through structured learning
content:
Scenario: Developing social skills through structured learning
    Given Jordan wants to improve conversation skills
    And social skills education can support relationship building
    When Jordan participates in social skills group
    Then the group uses accessible teaching methods (role-play, video modeling)
    And Jordan practices skills with peer learners
    And successes are celebrated and challenges are normalized
    And Jordan's social confidence grows through practice
    And improved skills enhance Jordan's community participation
    And Jordan experiences personal growth and capability development
